ygData.subject: Re: [eqenchanters] bow?
ygData.msgSnippet: This refers to a Throwing weapon. Pine needles are listed as a throwing weapon on the EQItems site (though the database is messed up).  Look at the stats for
ygData.messageBody:
This refers to a Throwing weapon.
Pine needles are listed as a throwing weapon on the EQItems site (though the database is messed up).  Look at the stats for them to see what I mean.
Dam/Delay 1/33
Weight 0.1

This is either a very odd arrow or a throwing weapon.
Essentially it is a light weight pulling weapon only if it is as described.
I doubt it is worth the trip to find out if this is incorrect.  I seem to recall seeing them myself but did not get them.  However that was many months ago so not only could I be remembering wrong it could have changed as well.
I doubt it is a bow though.

Stonedreamer
